name: Corinne G. Levin, 68, an Advocate for Children

name: J. K. Stout, Pioneering Judge In Pennsylvania, Is Dead at 79

name: Robert Heinecken, Artist Who Juxtaposed Photographs, Is Dead at 74

name: Steve Mizerak, National Pool Champion, Is Dead at 61
sentences: Steve Mizerak, who sank his first pocket billiards shot at age 4, became a national champion while a full-time schoolteacher, then emerged as a pop-culture celebrity doing TV beer commercials, died Monday in Boca Raton, Fla.
He transferred to Athens College in Alabama for his senior year, then became a teacher because the prize money in professional billiards was hardly spectacular.
After 13 years as a teacher, Mizerak quit in order to promote Miller Lite in billiards demonstrations at trade shows while continuing on the tournament circuit.

name: Red Auerbach, Who Built Basketball Dynasty, Dies at 89

name: Richard Gilman, Theater Critic, Dies at 83
